meanings.sent1: The superefficient machine completed the task in record time.
meanings.sent2: The superefficient team finished the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The superefficient robot never took a coffee break.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a superefficient processor, swiftly analyzing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The superefficient car zoomed through traffic effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Operating at a level of efficiency that exceeds normal standards
meanings.sent1: The superefficient factory produced double the usual output.
meanings.sent2: Their superefficient system saved them time and money.
meanings.sent3: The superefficient dishwasher finished cleaning before you could finish your meal.
meanings.sent4: His superefficient brain never seemed to tire, always finding solutions quickly.
meanings.sent5: The superefficient process streamlined their workflow, making everything easier.
